content.question: If<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the derivative of y with respect to x equals sine x times cosine squared x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi><msup> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamizaiaadMhaa8aabaWdbiaadsgacaWG4baa aiabg2da9iGacohacaGGPbGaaiOBaiaadIhaciGGJbGaai4Baiaaco hapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiaadIhaaaa@43EE@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> and if y=0 when <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="x equals pi divided by 2"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG4bGaeyypa0ZaaSaaa8aabaWdbiabec8aWbWdaeaapeGaaGOm aaaaaaa@3AE0@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> , what is the value of y when x=0 ?
